item.description:
Larches Inn Speaking Workshop With Dianne Legro

What would it mean for your business, if you could speak easily, confidently and meaningfully to your prospects and customers in a way that engages more business and new relationships?

Networking, leading workshops, giving presentations, making effective cold calls are all ways that establish relationships and create new business. If you would like to learn how to speak authentically, and acquire the tools for creating effective communications about you and your business this workshop is a must!

Dianne Legro is a speaker, trusted advisor and coach to people who have passion and vision for their business. She will help you translate your ideas and vision into stories and conversations that will spur your audience to engage.

“The magic of this process is that it cures stagefright! When Dianne helped me capture why I do what I do and for who, I no longer had any fear of speaking. My heart just went out to my audience. Dianne is an astonishing coach.” Terry Cadiente Author, entrepreneur, thrilled coaching client

Join Dianne At The Larches Inn For “Networking and Speaking Naturally”
She will explain how to be yourself and connect with your audience, how to find places to speak, how to create the perfect message and deliver it! She will show you secrets of the trade that have helped hundreds of her clients start speaking with ease and success and everyone will practice!

Join us April 18th 10 to 4 pm sign up now, this workshop will fill up!
item.name: Larches Inn Speaking Workshop With Dianne Legro
